poem:
Dance of Responsibility

A Taylor Swift song paused mid-spin,  
children twirling in innocence,  
when chaos unfolded in waves.  
Guilt pirouettes in the mind of the teacher,  
a fractured mirror reflecting blame.  
In the bathroom's refuge,  
a whisper—  
the dance will one day resume  
and reclaim its gentle rhythms  
from the silence of shattered moments.
